relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
There are many different clubs that you can join
Oakwood Univeristy is great for people who want to draw closer to God, and give you harts to Him
Ellen G. White was the first one to visit OU

There are teachers that are friendly and approachable, and they are willing to help you in any areas that you are weak in. Also you can peer up with a friend that is good in a subject, and they can tutoring. They have a tutoring program at Oakwood University. The people there are friendly and caring, and they will make you feel like you belong to OU.

You can go shopping with friends, go to the movies, have a party in your dorm room, go to parties with your friends, you can go to the basketball games, go to the church(OU worship is excellent), and they are many fun things to do with your friends.
There are several stores near Oakwood Campus or you can order your own food. Also there is a cafetaria.

The dorm life is amazing, where you can meet new people and feel comfortable around friends. You can do many things like have a study group, visit other people's dorm and one night have a pizza night with your friends and there are many things you can do to enjoy dorm life.

There are many excellent majors at Oakwood. They have a good Biology program (if you want to major in Biology), Computer Science, Early Childhood, Pre-Med, Nursing, Speech Pathology, Physical Therapist, and much more. I heard that the academics are excellent.

Even though college is expensive, never give up on your dreams and your goals. Always try to work and study hard, be focus in school, getting excellent grades, so when you graduate, you will say, YES I CAN DO IT!!! And if you don't your parents paying so much money in school, then you have to get good grades so you will get a scholarships. Make sure that you do extremely well on your SATs/ACTs.

I think that Oakwood U is a wonderful college, where there have many courses you can take, especially if you are majoring in Biology and want to attend Oakwood, there is a wonderful Biology program. It is a great experience for me because I visit there before and their worship experience is amazing. So if you want to attend OU, you have made the right choice.
pageTitle: Oakwood University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {110477=Oakwood is great for any christian student who has a passion for music. Oakwood produces many great musicians into the world: Musicians like Brian McKnight, Take 6, Virtue, and Commited. Oakwood University has many choirs that travel the world and many other various places. Also Oakwood University Aeolians Choirs are the reigning 2012 World Choir Olympics Champions., 304876=Oakwood is all about your perception. How you perceive it is what you will get. The friends are also what you make it. In addition, the teachers are, for the most part, supportive and caring. They want to see you succeed, and will do what ever it takes to help you reach your goal. There's also many communittee service opportunities in which you can participate. One day in October, there's something called Agape Day where the whole school shuts down and goes out in the community to help others. This year, the mayor came by to visit and share a few words before we left. You can also go on mission trips to other places to help out. Our choirs also travel to go and sing. Most of them stay in the states, however, our classical music choir (The Aeolians) travel around the world. You also get a good education and have opportunites to join programs that can help out with your future schooling (graduate school)., 231650=If your class starts at 3:30 what time should you leave Carter hall to get there?, 360683=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 236537=I stayed in Carter Hall for my freshman year, which wasn't bad. It needs a lot of work, but luckily it's getting rebuilt this year and will be ready by Spring 2014., 267205=Many may complain about the two major traditions that we have when you live on campus and you have not yet become a senior and they are worships and curfew. We are no longer required to have three worships a week in order to leave for the weekend, (after putting in a weekend leave) which may be a bother at times, but if we miss getting the three worships we do get a $10 fine. There are many opportunities to get three worships in during the week, but frankly sometimes you just forget or you just don't feel like going. When I came in, I didn't like the idea of getting three worships because I don't feel like anyone should be forced to get them, but as a matriculated through I realized it's just not that bad. It's a great way to pause from your work and refocus on God, relieving any stress that may have built up from the day. Chapel is something we have for an hour every Thursday morning at 10 AM to have praise and worship, news for students, and a positive thought for the day. If you don't have class until 2 PM it can be a drag, but it's for the good of the campus and its students. Curfew during the week for freshmen is at 12 AM and 1 AM on Saturday's, for upperclassmen its 1 AM every day of the week (except 11:30 PM for all students on Friday nights) while living on campus. This is a bother to many and on few occasions have been an issue for me, but honestly most of the time youÃ¢Â?Â?re in before curfew any ways because it's a school night. All in all, Oakwood is trying to enforce discipline and values into our lives., 111645=In 2012 Oakwood has won many scholastic events. We are the 2012 National Champions in division 3 basketball. We currently just won the 2012 World Choir Olympics, and we produced the great singing group Committed who won the show The Sing Off., 166518=For those that kept their gpa's up in highschool, they have an opportunity to stay in the honors wing. It is first come first serve among those who fit the criteria so don't waste time applying for the honors wing. Describing the physical condition of Carter Hall is pointless because they are renovating the dorm this summer. So the class of 2013 will be in a new building. However, the RA's and Deans are very nice. They are very reasonable and fair when it comes to issues., 128902=Oakwood University is a decent institution. It is in between. May change lives for those who are religious.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety on-campus security that is on patrol 24/7. Greek Life no greek life sorry. Clubs and Activities various clubs and organizations from choirs, bands, poetry clubs, art clubs, and biomedical science clubs to volunteer services and mission trips. Great for these types of students christians, minorities, and all others. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus there is a historic slave cemetery located on the campus. additionally, the only time that dr. martin luther king jr. came to alabama he visited the oakwood university campus where he gave a speech. ellen g. white museum located in the library. Bang for the buck the on campus student government works diligently to ensure the students get heard. the tuition is fairly low and there is lots of help available for students. the university president is very approachable and helpful. he allows students to visit him freely and make suggestions. What to do for fun bowling, movies, skating, exercise, worship, dancing, clubs, poetry,
